abstract: Nebraska lawmakers vote 30 to 13 to advance bill that would replace capital punishment with life imprisonment for first-degree murder.
lead_paragraph: The state is considering repealing the death penalty amid a shortage of lethal injection drugs, with legislation to eliminate capital punishment clearing a major hurdle on Thursday.

headline.main: Nebraska: Measure Repealing Death Penalty Advances
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Measure Repealing Death Penalty Advances

snippet: The state is considering repealing the death penalty amid a shortage of lethal injection drugs, with legislation to eliminate capital punishment clearing a major hurdle on Thursday.
